name: Star Invader
description:
Star Invader

A space invader clone for testing my homemade javascript engine using HTML 5, JS and Canvas for the graphics.

Space Bar to shoot, Arrows to move.

Programming/Graphics : Guidi Simone

Sounds Effects : 8Bit Video Games by sharesynth from freesounds.org

The project is a work in progress, the images used are not the final graphics of the game, it may have many bugs or graphics glitch, it saves only the last highscore in the browser cache.

If you have any suggestions or comments on the game or the engine don't esitate to send me a message. If you want to have the engine source just contact me.
